text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Allohu Rasulas imon ovardaed, cun ʙixohed, ki ʙo pajomʙar (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) nacvo kuned (pinhoni suxan gued), pes az nacvo kardanaton sadaqa ʙidihed ʙa hocatmandon. In ʙaroi sumo az cihati savoʙ ʙehtar va ʙar dilhojaton pokizatar ast. Va agar ʙaroi sadaqa cize najofted ʙoke nest, pas hamono Alloh omurzandavu mehruʙon ast
